    }

        const akoInputs = document.querySelectorAll('.ako-input, input.ako-input');

                    event.stopPropagation();
                    break; // 找到並處理後就跳出循環
                }
                targetElement = targetElement.parentElement;
            }
        });

        // 針對手機版，確保下拉選單項目始終可點擊
        const menuListItems = akoSection.querySelectorAll('.ako-menu-list li[data-invoice]');
        menuListItems.forEach(item => {
            item.style.setProperty('pointer-events', 'auto', 'important');
            item.style.setProperty('cursor', 'pointer', 'important');
            item.style.setProperty('touch-action', 'manipulation', 'important');
            item.style.setProperty('-webkit-tap-highlight-color', 'rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.4)', 'important');
            item.style.setProperty('user-select', 'none', 'important');
            item.style.setProperty('-webkit-user-select', 'none', 'important');
            item.style.setProperty('-moz-user-select', 'none', 'important');
            item.style.setProperty('-ms-user-select', 'none', 'important');
        });

        // 確保按鈕本身也始終可點擊
        const menuButton = akoSection.querySelector('.ako-menu-button');
        if (menuButton) {
            menuButton.style.setProperty('pointer-events', 'auto', 'important');
            menuButton.style.setProperty('cursor', 'pointer', 'important');
            menuButton.style.setProperty('touch-action', 'manipulation', 'important');
            menuButton.style.setProperty('-webkit-tap-highlight-color', 'rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.4)', 'important');
            menuButton.style.setProperty('user-select', 'none', 'important');
            menuButton.style.setProperty('-webkit-user-select', 'none', 'important');
            menuButton.style.setProperty('-moz-user-select', 'none', 'important');
            menuButton.style.setProperty('-ms-user-select', 'none', 'important');
        }

        // 觀察 DOM 變化，如果插件動態添加或修改元素，重新應用樣式
        const observer = new MutationObserver(mutations => {
            mutations.forEach(mutation => {
                if (mutation.type === 'childList' || mutation.type === 'attributes') {
                    const newItems = akoSection.querySelectorAll('.ako-menu-list li[data-invoice]');
                    newItems.forEach(item => {
                        item.style.setProperty('pointer-events', 'auto', 'important');
                        item.style.setProperty('cursor', 'pointer', 'important');
                        item.style.setProperty('touch-action', 'manipulation', 'important');
                        item.style.setProperty('-webkit-tap-highlight-color', 'rgba(255, 107, 53, 0.4)', 'important');
                        item.style.setProperty('user-select', 'none', 'important');
                        item.style.setProperty('-webkit-user-select', 'none', 'important');
                        item.style.setProperty('-moz-user-select', 'none', 'important');
                        item.style.setProperty('-ms-user-select', 'none', 'important');
                    });
                }
            });
        });

        // 配置觀察器選項：監聽子節點變化和屬性變化
        const config = { childList: true, subtree: true, attributes: true };
        observer.observe(akoSection, config);
    }

    // 輸入框增強功能
    const enhanceInputs = () => {
        const akoInputs = document.querySelectorAll('.ako-input, input.ako-input');
        
        akoInputs.forEach(function(input) {
            // 避免重複綁定
            if (input.hasAttribute('data-ako-enhanced')) return;
            input.setAttribute('data-ako-enhanced', 'true');
            
            // 焦點增強效果
            input.addEventListener('focus', function() {
                this.classList.add('ako-input--focused');
                // 輕微震動反饋（支援的設備）
                if (navigator.vibrate) {
                    navigator.vibrate(10);
                }
            });
            
            input.addEventListener('blur', function() {
                this.classList.remove('ako-input--focused');
            });
            
            // 即時驗證反饋
            input.addEventListener('input', function() {
                // 移除錯誤狀態（如果有輸入內容）
                if (this.value.trim() !== '') {
                    this.setAttribute('aria-invalid', 'false');
                    this.classList.remove('ako-input--error');
                }
                
                // 特殊處理統一編號格式
                if (this.name === 'ako-company-code') {
                    // 只允許數字，最多8位
                    this.value = this.value.replace(/\D/g, '').slice(0, 8);
                    
                    // 即時驗證統一編號長度
                    if (this.value.length === 8) {
                        this.classList.add('ako-input--valid');
                    } else {
                        this.classList.remove('ako-input--valid');
                    }
                }
                
                // 公司名稱長度提示
                if (this.name === 'ako-company-name') {
                    if (this.value.length > 50) {
                        this.value = this.value.slice(0, 50);
                    }
                }
            });
            
            // 貼上事件處理
            input.addEventListener('paste', function(e) {
                setTimeout(() => {
                    this.dispatchEvent(new Event('input', { bubbles: true }));
                }, 0);
            });
        });
    };

    // 初始化輸入框增強
    enhanceInputs();

    // 監聽 DOM 變化，為新增的輸入框加上增強功能
    const inputObserver = new MutationObserver(function(mutations) {
        mutations.forEach(function(mutation) {
            mutation.addedNodes.forEach(function(node) {
                if (node.nodeType === 1) { // 元素節點
                    enhanceInputs(); // 重新掃描所有輸入框
                }
            });
        });
    });

    // 觀察整個文檔的變化
    if (akoSection) {

            subtree: true
        });

<script>
// 響應式 JavaScript 增強
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    // 偵測裝置類型
    const isMobile = /iPhone|iPad|iPod|Android/i.test(navigator.userAgent);
    const isTouch = 'ontouchstart' in window || navigator.maxTouchPoints > 0;

    // 下拉選單響應式處理
    const menuButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.ako-menu-button');
    const menuLists = document.querySelectorAll('.ako-menu-list');

    menuButtons.forEach((button, index) => {
        const list = menuLists[index];
        if (!list) return;

        // 點擊事件處理
        button.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            e.stopPropagation();
            
            const isOpen = list.style.maxHeight && list.style.maxHeight !== '0px';
            
            // 關閉其他開啟的選單
            menuLists.forEach((otherList, otherIndex) => {
                if (otherIndex !== index) {
                    otherList.style.maxHeight = '0px';
                }
            });

            // 切換當前選單
            if (isOpen) {
                list.style.maxHeight = '0px';
            } else {
                // 計算實際高度
                list.style.maxHeight = 'none';
                const actualHeight = list.scrollHeight;
                list.style.maxHeight = '0px';
                
                // 觸發重排
                list.offsetHeight;
                
                // 設定動畫高度
                list.style.maxHeight = actualHeight + 'px';
            }
        });
    });

    // 點擊外部關閉選單
    document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
        if (!e.target.closest('.ako-menu')) {
            menuLists.forEach(list => {
                list.style.maxHeight = '0px';
            });
        }
    });

    // 選單項目點擊處理
    const menuItems = document.querySelectorAll('.ako-menu__item');
    menuItems.forEach(item => {
        item.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            e.stopPropagation();
            
            // 更新按鈕顯示
            const menu = this.closest('.ako-menu');
            const button = menu.querySelector('.ako-menu-button');
            const list = menu.querySelector('.ako-menu-list');
            
            if (button && list) {
                // 更新按鈕內容
                button.innerHTML = this.innerHTML + button.querySelector('.ako-menu-button__arrow').outerHTML;
                
                // 關閉選單
                list.style.maxHeight = '0px';
                
                // 更新選中狀態
                menuItems.forEach(mi => mi.classList.remove('selected'));
                this.classList.add('selected');
            }
        });
    });

    // 視窗大小改變時的處理
    let resizeTimer;
    window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
        clearTimeout(resizeTimer);
        resizeTimer = setTimeout(function() {
            // 重置所有選單高度
            menuLists.forEach(list => {
                if (list.style.maxHeight && list.style.maxHeight !== '0px') {
                    list.style.maxHeight = list.scrollHeight + 'px';
                }
            });
        }, 250);
    });

    // 觸控設備優化
    if (isTouch) {
        // 防止雙擊縮放
        let lastTouchEnd = 0;
        document.addEventListener('touchend', function(e) {
            const now = Date.now();
            if (now - lastTouchEnd <= 300) {
                e.preventDefault();
            }
            lastTouchEnd = now;
        }, false);

        // 改善點擊反饋
        const clickableElements = document.querySelectorAll(
            '.ako-menu-button, .ako-menu__item, .akocommerce-logistics-button, ' +
            '.akocommerce-company-button, .ako-checkbox, .ako-input'
        );

        clickableElements.forEach(element => {
            element.addEventListener('touchstart', function() {
                this.classList.add('touching');
            });

            element.addEventListener('touchend', function() {
                setTimeout(() => {
                    this.classList.remove('touching');
                }, 100);
            });
        });
    }

    // 平滑滾動到結果
    const observer = new MutationObserver(function(mutations) {
        mutations.forEach(function(mutation) {
            if (mutation.type === 'childList') {
                const results = document.querySelectorAll('.akocommerce-result');
                results.forEach(result => {
                    if (!result.hasAttribute('data-scrolled')) {
                        result.setAttribute('data-scrolled', 'true');
                        
                        // 延遲滾動以確保動畫完成
                        setTimeout(() => {
                            result.scrollIntoView({ 
                                behavior: 'smooth', 
                                block: 'center',
                                inline: 'nearest'
                            });
                        }, 300);
                    }
                });
            }
        });
    });

    const akoSection = document.getElementById('akocommerce_cvs_section') || document.querySelector('.akoCvsScNS');
    if (akoSection) {
        observer.observe(akoSection, { 
            childList: true, 
            subtree: true 
        });
    }
});

// 觸控狀態樣式
const touchStyles = document.createElement('style');
touchStyles.textContent = `
    .touching {
        opacity: 0.8 !important;
        transform: scale(0.98) !important;
    }
`;
document.head.appendChild(touchStyles);
</script>

/* 發票選項和輸入框的包裝容器 */
.ako-invoice {
    position: relative !important;
}

/* 確保選項、輸入框、同意勾選的順序 */
.ako-invoice-setting + .ako-form-row {
    order: 2 !important;
}

.ako-invoice-setting + .ako-form-row + .ako-checkbox {
    order: 3 !important;
}

.ako-invoice-setting + .ako-company-invoice {
    order: 2 !important;
}

.ako-invoice-setting + .ako-company-invoice + .ako-checkbox {
    order: 3 !important;
}
</style>

<script>
// 強制顯示下拉選單為選項列表
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    let checkInterval;
    let checkCount = 0;
    
    function initializeAko() {
        const akoSection = document.getElementById('akocommerce_cvs_section') || document.querySelector('.akoCvsScNS');
        if (!akoSection) {
            checkCount++;
            if (checkCount > 20) {
                clearInterval(checkInterval);
            }
            return;
        }
        
        clearInterval(checkInterval);
        
        // 確保選單始終顯示
        const menuLists = document.querySelectorAll('.ako-menu-list');
        menuLists.forEach(list => {
            list.style.setProperty('max-height', 'none', 'important');
            list.style.setProperty('overflow', 'visible', 'important');
            list.style.setProperty('opacity', '1', 'important');
            list.style.setProperty('visibility', 'visible', 'important');
            list.style.setProperty('display', 'flex', 'important');
            list.style.setProperty('position', 'static', 'important');
        });

        // 為每個選項添加點擊效果
        function handleInvoiceSelection() {
            const menuItems = document.querySelectorAll('.ako-menu__item');
            
            menuItems.forEach(item => {
                item.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                    e.stopPropagation();
                    
                    // 移除其他選中狀態
                    menuItems.forEach(i => {
                        i.classList.remove('selected');
                        i.removeAttribute('data-selected');
                    });
                    
                    // 添加選中狀態
                    this.classList.add('selected');
                    this.setAttribute('data-selected', 'true');
                    
                    // 獲取發票類型
                    const invoiceType = this.getAttribute('data-invoice') || 
                                      this.querySelector('[data-invoice]')?.getAttribute('data-invoice') ||
                                      (this.textContent.includes('手機條碼') ? 'carrier' : 
                                       this.textContent.includes('公司') ? 'company' : 'donation');
                    
                    // 找到輸入框區域
                    let formRow = document.querySelector('.ako-form-row');
                    let companyInvoice = document.querySelector('.ako-company-invoice');
                    
                    // 如果找不到，創建一個
                    if (!formRow && invoiceType === 'carrier') {
                        const invoiceSetting = document.querySelector('.ako-invoice-setting');
                        if (invoiceSetting) {
                            formRow = document.createElement('div');
                            formRow.className = 'ako-form-row';
                            formRow.innerHTML = `
                                <label class="ako-label">手機條碼載具號碼</label>
                                <input type="text" class="ako-input" placeholder="請輸入手機條碼，例如：/ABC1234">
                                <div class="ako-helper-text">請輸入正確的載具號碼</div>
                            `;
                            invoiceSetting.parentNode.insertBefore(formRow, invoiceSetting.nextSibling);
                        }
                    }
                    
                    // 根據選擇顯示/隱藏對應的輸入區域
                    if (formRow) {
                        if (invoiceType === 'carrier') {
                            formRow.classList.add('show');
                            formRow.style.display = 'block';
                            setTimeout(() => {
                                formRow.style.opacity = '1';
                                formRow.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
                            }, 10);
                        } else {
                            formRow.classList.remove('show');
                            formRow.style.opacity = '0';
                            formRow.style.transform = 'translateY(-10px)';
                            setTimeout(() => {
                                formRow.style.display = 'none';
                            }, 300);
                        }
                    }
                    
                    if (companyInvoice) {
                        if (invoiceType === 'company') {
                            companyInvoice.classList.add('show');
                            companyInvoice.style.display = 'flex';
                            setTimeout(() => {
                                companyInvoice.style.opacity = '1';
                                companyInvoice.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
                            }, 10);
                        } else {
                            companyInvoice.classList.remove('show');
                            companyInvoice.style.opacity = '0';
                            companyInvoice.style.transform = 'translateY(-10px)';
                            setTimeout(() => {
                                companyInvoice.style.display = 'none';
                            }, 300);
                        }
                    }
                });
            });
        }

        handleInvoiceSelection();

        // 物流按鈕點擊效果
        const logisticsButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.akocommerce-logistics-button');
        logisticsButtons.forEach(button => {
            button.addEventListener('click', function() {
                logisticsButtons.forEach(b => b.classList.remove('active'));
                this.classList.add('active');
            });
        });

        // 使用 MutationObserver 監聽動態變化
        const observer = new MutationObserver(function(mutations) {
            mutations.forEach(function(mutation) {
                // 監聽新增的發票選項
                if (mutation.addedNodes.length > 0) {
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        handleInvoiceSelection();
                    }, 100);
                }
                
                // 監聽結果顯示
                const results = document.querySelectorAll('.akocommerce-result');
                results.forEach(result => {
                    if (!result.classList.contains('show')) {
                        result.classList.add('show');
                        result.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'center' });
                    }
                });
            });
        });

        observer.observe(akoSection, { 
            childList: true, 
            subtree: true,
            attributes: true,
            attributeFilter: ['class', 'data-selected', 'data-invoice']
        });
    }

    // 立即嘗試初始化
    initializeAko();
    
    // 如果沒找到，定期檢查
    checkInterval = setInterval(initializeAko, 500);
});
</script>
